name: Fitly - Workout App
description:
The first impression is the most important. If a picture is worth a thousand words, imagine the impact of a short animation. Tell your story to your readers, viewers, and clients.


In Fitly - Workout App file you can find a set of animations for the loading screen, homepage introduction sequence, advanced transitions based on containers, swipeable cards, and more.


This is only an example, showcasing what can be done in Figma using auto animate. Use it whether as a reference or copy & paste it into your prototypes.


Duplicate the file and enjoy!


We're available for new projects! Drop us a line at ux@netguru.com.
